1.text:
## Simple Text Screen

Tell a part of the story or describe the current location.

Free text, written in [markdown](https://help.github.com/articles/markdown-basics/).

2.text:
## Input Screen

Ask a question, and only the correct answer will let the player continue.

_1 + 2?_

3.text:
## Multiple choice

Navigation to the next screen is blocked until the user selects an option. Different options can cause navigation to happen to different next screens or increase the players score points.

choices.text: Options can use the __markdown__ format any other text
Options can have a 'points' property by which the players score is increased
Options can have a 'next' property pointing to the next screen
It's also possible to have a default 'next' property on the choices definition. Specifying 'next' on an option takes precedence over the default.
